definitions.definition: Having the necessary powers or the needed resources to accomplish a task.
Free from constraints preventing completion of task; permitted to; not prevented from.
definitions.example: I’ll see you as soon as I’m able.

definitions.definition: Having the physical strength; robust; healthy.
definitions.example: After the past week of forced marches, only half the men are fully able.
He was born to an able family.

definitions.definition: Gifted with skill, intelligence, knowledge, or competence.
definitions.example: The chairman was also an able sailor.
He is able to practice law in six states.

definitions.definition: Capable of performing all the requisite duties; as an able seaman.
